channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: President Trump commutes the prison sentence of George Santos
item.description: The disgraced New York Republican was sentenced to more than seven years in prison after pleading guilty to a litany of federal charges, including wir...

item.title: Mystery heatwave warms Pacific Ocean to new record
item.description: Temperatures have surged across a large area of the north Pacific - and scientists don't know exactly why.

item.title: 'It's scary to think I could have died': How Americans are coming back from fentanyl addiction
item.description: Fatal overdoses in the US are falling - and Kayla's state of North Carolina is at the forefront of that trend.

item.title: 10/17: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: Nuclear agency workers set to be furloughed as shutdown continues; Reporter's Notebook: What is work for?

item.title: Alaska storm damage could displace some evacuees for at least 18 months
item.description: Anchorage leaders said Friday they expect as many as 1,600 people to be evacuated to the state's largest city.

item.title: 'We have to prioritise South Africans': Anti-migrant movement blocks foreigners from healthcare
item.description: Activists are stopping foreigners going to some health clinics with little push-back from the state.

item.title: Grand Sumo in London? An ancient sport finds new fans far beyond Japan
item.description: Going to Japan is almost the only way to see a top-flight suo sumo tournament. This week, London is hosting.

item.title: Government shutdown becomes third-longest in history with no end in sight
item.description: The government shutdown is now the third-longest funding lapse in modern history, and the Senate won't meet until Monday.

item.title: Buying more, wearing less - why India's Diwali gold rush is different
item.description: Soaring gold prices have dented jewellery demand but Indians are not ready to give up on the metal yet.

item.title: Trump commutes George Santos' prison sentence
item.description: In a post on Truth Social, the president said the ex-New York congressman has been "horribly mistreated" in prison.

item.title: Several hurt after apartment balcony collapses in Cincinnati
item.description: At least 10 people were injured when the wooden balcony of a third-floor apartment collapsed near the campus of the University of Cincinnati, official...

item.title: Shooter at Dallas ICE facility was motivated by notoriety over ideology
item.description: A newly released police report states that Joshua Jahn lived with his family and didn't have a job.

item.title: What we know about the devastating storm in Western Alaska
item.description: The remnant of Typhoon Halong slammed the Yukon-Kuskokwim Delta, an area in Western Alaska hundreds of miles from the U.S. road system. More than a th...

item.title: A GOP attack ad deepfakes Chuck Schumer with AI
item.description: The 30-second video from the National Republican Senatorial Committee is raising alarms among many observers who warn it crosses a new boundary in pol...

item.title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to allow National Guard deployment in Illinois
item.description: The Trump administration filed an appeal to the Supreme Court on Friday, asking it to lift lower-court rulings blocking Trump from deploying National ...

item.title: Alaska storm damage so bad many evacuees won’t go home for at least 18 months, governor says

item.description: A new AP-NORC poll finds that more U.S. adults support President Donald Trump’s handling of the conflict in Israel after he brokered a ceasefire deal ...

item.title: Bolton pleads not guilty in Justice Department case accusing him of sharing government secrets
